trans-unit.source: Invoice your bookings in Business Central | Microsoft Docs

seg-source.mrk: Invoice your bookings in Business Central | Microsoft Docs

target.mrk: Fakturace Vašich rezervací Business Central | Microsoft Docs

trans-unit.source: Learn how you can do bulk invoicing from Microsoft Bookings in Business Central .

seg-source.mrk: Learn how you can do bulk invoicing from Microsoft Bookings in Business Central .

target.mrk: Naučte se, jak můžete provádět hromadnou fakturaci z Microsoft Bookings v Business Central

trans-unit.source: Bulk Invoicing for Microsoft Bookings in [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)]

seg-source.mrk: Bulk Invoicing for Microsoft Bookings in

target.mrk: Hromadná fakturace v Microsoft Bookings v

trans-unit.source: If your company uses the Bookings app in Office 365, you can do bulk invoicing for appointments.

seg-source.mrk: If your company uses the Bookings app in Office 365, you can do bulk invoicing for appointments.

target.mrk: Pokud vaše společnost používá aplikaci Bookings v Office 365, můžete provést hromadnou fakturaci.

trans-unit.source: The **Uninvoiced Bookings** page in [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] provides a list of the company's completed bookings.

seg-source.mrk: The **Uninvoiced Bookings** page in [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] provides a list of the company's completed bookings.

target.mrk: Stránka **Booking Nevyfakturované položky** v [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] obsahuje seznam dokončených rezervací společnosti.

trans-unit.source: In this page you can quickly select the appointments that you want to invoice and create draft invoices for the services provided.

seg-source.mrk: In this page you can quickly select the appointments that you want to invoice and create draft invoices for the services provided.

target.mrk: Na této stránce můžete rychle vybrat události, které chcete fakturovat, a vytvořit návrhy faktury za poskytované služby.

trans-unit.source: Connect to Bookings

seg-source.mrk: Connect to Bookings

target.mrk: Připojení k Bookings

trans-unit.source: To connect your [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] with Bookings, you must specify your Bookings company, what to synchronize with Bookings, how often to synchronize, and which templates to use.

seg-source.mrk: To connect your [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] with Bookings, you must specify your Bookings company, what to synchronize with Bookings, how often to synchronize, and which templates to use.

target.mrk: Chcete-li se spojit v [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] s Bookings, musíte určit Účetní společnost, co synchronizovat s Bookings, jak často synchronizovat a jaké šablony použít.

trans-unit.source: You set up this information on the **Booking Sync. Setup** page, which you can launch from the **Exchange Sync. Setup** page, which you can find through [Search](ui-search.md).

seg-source.mrk: You set up this information on the **Booking Sync.
Setup** page, which you can launch from the **Exchange Sync.
Setup** page, which you can find through [Search](ui-search.md).

target.mrk: Tyto položky můžete nastavit v **Booking Nastavení
synchronizace**, které můžete spustit z **Nastavení synchronizace
Exchange**, které můžete najít skrz [Vyhledat](ui-search.md)

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want to synchronize customers between Bookings and [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)], you must specify the default template to use to add new customers in [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] based on the customers in your Bookings company.

seg-source.mrk: For example, if you want to synchronize customers between Bookings and [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)], you must specify the default template to use to add new customers in [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] based on the customers in your Bookings company.

target.mrk: Pokud například chcete synchronizovat zákazníky mezi Bookings a [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)], musíte určit výchozí šablonu, pomocí které se budou přidávat noví zákazníci v [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] na základě zákazníků ve vaší účetní společnosti.

trans-unit.source: The Bookings app is designed to book appointments for individual customers rather than companies.

seg-source.mrk: The Bookings app is designed to book appointments for individual customers rather than companies.

target.mrk: Aplikace Bookings je určena k rezervování schůzek pro jednotlivé zákazníky, než pro společnosti.

trans-unit.source: The synchronization with [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] will, therefore, only synchronize customer contacts with a Type of "Person".

seg-source.mrk: The synchronization with [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] will, therefore, only synchronize customer contacts with a Type of "Person".

target.mrk: Synchronizace s [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] bude tedy pouze synchronizovat kontakty se zákazníkem s typem „Osoba“.

trans-unit.source: An email address is also required for the contact to synchronize.

seg-source.mrk: An email address is also required for the contact to synchronize.

target.mrk: Pro synchronizaci je potřeba zadat také e-mailovovou adresu.

trans-unit.source: Similarly, if you want to synchronize service items between Bookings and [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)], you must specify the default template to use to add new service items in [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] based on the services in our Bookings company.

seg-source.mrk: Similarly, if you want to synchronize service items between Bookings and [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)], you must specify the default template to use to add new service items in [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] based on the services in our Bookings company.

target.mrk: Podobně, jako když chcete synchronizovat předměty servisu mezi Bookings a [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)], musíte určit výchozí šablonu, pomocí které se budou přidávat nové předměty servisu v [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] na základě služeb ve vaší Účetní společnosti.

trans-unit.source: Only items of type *Service* will synchronize between Bookings and [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)].

seg-source.mrk: Only items of type *Service* will synchronize between Bookings and [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)].

target.mrk: Pouze položky typu *Služby* se budou synchronizovat mezi Bookings a [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The template that you set up in the **Configuration Templates** page so it can be used for the item synchronization must define the type as *Service*.

seg-source.mrk: The template that you set up in the **Configuration Templates** page so it can be used for the item synchronization must define the type as *Service*.

target.mrk: Šablona, kterou jste nastavili na stránce **Konfigurační šablony**, aby mohla být použita pro synchronizaci položky, musí být definována jako *Služba*.

trans-unit.source: Invoice Appointments

seg-source.mrk: Invoice Appointments

target.mrk: Fakturační události

trans-unit.source: When it is time to send invoices for the completed bookings, you go to the **Uninvoiced Bookings** page.

seg-source.mrk: When it is time to send invoices for the completed bookings, you go to the **Uninvoiced Bookings** page.

target.mrk: Když je čas poslat faktury za dokončené rezervace, běžte na stránku **Nefakturované rezervace**.

trans-unit.source: Depending on how often the information is synchronized, the list is long or short.

seg-source.mrk: Depending on how often the information is synchronized, the list is long or short.

target.mrk: V závislosti na tom, jak často jsou informace synchronizovány, je seznam dlouhý nebo krátký.

trans-unit.source: You can create invoices for all bookings in the list or one booking at a time.

seg-source.mrk: You can create invoices for all bookings in the list or one booking at a time.

target.mrk: Můžete vytvářet faktury pro všechny rezervace v seznamu nebo jednu rezervaci najednou.

trans-unit.source: You can select one or more entries in the list and invoice those only.

seg-source.mrk: You can select one or more entries in the list and invoice those only.

target.mrk: V seznamu můžete vybrat jednu nebo více položek a fakturovat je pouze je.

trans-unit.source: The support for invoicing appointments from Bookings is simpler than the fuller workflow of working with sales quotes, sales orders, and sales invoices.

seg-source.mrk: The support for invoicing appointments from Bookings is simpler than the fuller workflow of working with sales quotes, sales orders, and sales invoices.

target.mrk: Podpora Fakturační události z Bookings je jednodušší než workflow práce s prodejními nabídkami, prodejními objednávkami a prodejními fakturami.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Invoice Sales](sales-how-invoice-sales.md).

seg-source.mrk: For more information, see [Invoice Sales](sales-how-invoice-sales.md).

target.mrk: Další informace naleznete v [Prodejní faktury](sales-how-invoice-sales.md).

trans-unit.source: You can choose to sell your services using [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] or choose to use Bookings, depending on your business needs.

seg-source.mrk: You can choose to sell your services using [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] or choose to use Bookings, depending on your business needs.

target.mrk: Můžete si vybrat, zda chcete své služby prodat pomocí [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)], nebo si vybrat, zda chcete rezervovat Bookings, v závislosti na vašich obchodních potřebách.
